review: prime and nonprime shows in same listings - and the movies I want to watch/series seem to all be not prime so there for additional cost (full series harry potter, full series twilight etc etc)  otherwise, this works like a charm and I LOVE it
author: smithcr01

review: It was not what I expected,  returned to best buy!!
author: tiffany jackson

review: I thought it was a camping fire starter so I was a little disappointed that it doesn't do that, but on the plus side I have Netflix, Hulu and more all in the same place.
author: Kelly Comstock

review: Overall...great device for the price.  For those with minimal tech skills...that's us!...it's a great way to get video on Prime, Netflix, etc.  Those with higher skills may find it too basic.  We aren't gamers so cannot speak to that.Pros: Simple to set up.  Simple all around...ideal for us.Cons: A tad glitchy at times...nothing that impacts viewing particularly but a bit odd.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Does everything flawlessly and as described. Only thing I would change is more customization options, other than that best dingle on the market.
author: Q Boogie

review: Perfect.  Easy set up.  Does everything it says it would.
author: Mels23

review: Great ! I wish I could bought it earlier. Use it to watch Amazon Prime, NetFlix and Youtube and they all work great.
author: bearone
